item.description:
New England Air Museum, Rte 75, Windsor Locks

Climb into airplanes and play pilot. Among the aircraft open are WW II planes, vintage airliners and helicopters. Try the real-flight simulator the "Dream Seeker." Other activities throughout the day. Open 10-5. Adults $9, children (6-11) $4, 5 and under free. Let's meet at 2 pm at entrance.

CHILDREN WELCOME!

After our tour we will go for dinner at Skyline Restaurant on 106 Ella Grasso Tpke Windsor Locks, Rte 75 near the Bradley Airport.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Open Cockpit Sunday at New England Air Museum and Dinner at Skyline
